text.english:
Friday July 7th Shuttles from Toronto to Niagara Falls
Only riders with their name on the roster will be guaranteed a seat on the Friday evening shuttles; all other participants will be placed on standby.
Shuttle Departs: Exhibition Place Parking Lot 2, 200 Princes’ Boulevard Toronto, ON M6K 3C3
Shuttle Drop Off: Niagara Falls Host Hotel, Marriott on the Falls

text.english:
Saturday Morning June 10th Shuttles from Host Hotels to Opening Ceremonies
Shuttles will run between 6:00 a.m. and 6:45 a.m. from each start line Host Hotel in Niagara and Toronto to the respective start line. Shuttles fill on a first come, first serve basis and depart when full according to the time frame below. Please note Bike Transport will not be provided with the Saturday morning shuttles. All Bike Transport to the Opening Ceremonies location will need to be arranged separately by the participant.

text.english:
Niagara Finish Line to Toronto Ride Venue
A luxury coach for you and separate truck for your bike, provided by Mackie Group, will depart from the Finish Line in Niagara Falls and take you back to Exhibition Place in Toronto.
Shuttles will repeatedly run throughout the day beginning at 12:00 p.m. and depart when full.
NOTE: The Sunday Shuttles Will Only Run From Niagara to Toronto. There will be NO shuttles to host hotels on Sunday.

Shuttle Pick Up: Niagara Falls Opening Ceremonies, 7200 Niagara Parkway, Niagara Falls, ON
Shuttle Drop Off: Exhibition Place (Enercare), Parking Lot 2 - 200 Princes' Boulevard - Toronto, ON
